TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Cihafayan, title = Cihafayan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cihafayan} }

S.FORM: Cihafayan Itiniay i Fenglin Cen no Hualien ko Cihafayan a niyaro', 101 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 221 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 83% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 183 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 17% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 38 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 77%, Truku 1%, Tayal 2%, Bunun 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Cihafayan Itiniay i Fenglin Cen no Hoalien ko Cihafayan a niyaro', 101 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 221 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 83% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 183 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 17% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 38 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Amis 77%, Troko 1%, Tayal 2%, Bonon 1%, roma 1%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
